allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Discovery Engine Phase 3 - Full Pipeline Integration

Major features added:
- Pipeline orchestrator (workflows/pipeline.py) with CLI (run_pipeline.py)
- NotionPusher batch processor with confidence-based routing
- SuppressionSync for Notion → SQLite cache synchronization
- BaseCollector class with storage integration
- 4 signal collectors: SEC EDGAR, GitHub, Companies House, Domain WHOIS
- SQLite signal storage layer with 3 tables
- MCP server with 5 prompts and 3 tools
- 7 Claude agents and 7 skills

Pipeline stages: collect() → store() → dedupe() → verify() → push()

Routing logic:
- HIGH confidence (0.7+) + multi-source → Status: "Source"
- MEDIUM confidence (0.4-0.7) → Status: "Tracking"
- LOW confidence (<0.4) → Hold for review
EOF
)")
